sentence.Network_en: She took the needle off the record and turned the lights out.

sentence.Network_en: The janitor comes round to turn the lights out.
sentence.Network_cn: 看门人巡视一圈，把灯熄灭。

sentence.Network_en: Does this mean no hanky-panky after lights out?
sentence.Network_cn: 这是否意味着熄灯以后不许有性行为？
